author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r31057, the fix for issue #3157, fix a bug when filtering
(do_directory_merge): When filtering mergeinfo from a subtree's natural
history use the repository relative merge source path for the subtree,
*not* the merge target's; the latter won't filter anything.
(dont_explicitly_record_implicit_mergeinfo): Expand this test so it covers
this bug.  Also do our standard "merge kludge" thing.

author: hwright
msg: Fix circular dependency between libsvn_ra and libsvn_ra_serf by teaching
Trivial fix. Necessary for cygwin build.

author: hwright
msg: Use 'void *' to avoid compile warnings and eliminate casts.
Trivial fix. Allows clean build with EXTRA_CFLAGS='-Wall

author: hwright
msg: Fix memory leaks in Python bindings.
Depends on r31055 and r31066 (see above)

author: hwright
msg: Make svn_wc_diff_callbacks2_t work in Python (not a new interface,
it was just broken for Python until r31055).
subversion/bindings/swig' cleanly merges the Python change.
